Posts.Content: Sep 2, 2014 02:48AM duckkerbo wrote: I am new on here. I was initially diagnosed in July 2012 and went through surgery, chemo, and radiation. I was in remission. I recently was in the hospital because of a kidney infection that went septic. In the testing, they found several spots on my liver. I had a biopsy and last Thursday I got the news that it is liver mets. I am scared and need some morale support from others in the same situation.
Posts.Title: Need hope and inspiration from others with liver mets Linnette1217 Cafelovr
